definition: to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: Operation was the most effective therapy for jaw hemangiomas.
sentences.chinese: 對頜骨血管瘤手術治療是最有效的手段。

sentences.english: Objective To observe and summarize the therapeutic effects of maxillofacial hemangioma in chlidren.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察和總結頜面部血管瘤的治療效果。

sentences.english: Pregnancy and estrogen-based medications can cause cavernous hemangiomas to grow.
sentences.chinese: 妊娠和雌激素藥物可能導致的海綿狀血管瘤增長。

sentences.chinese: 目的探討冷凍治療小兒血管瘤的有效性。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate methods of microsurgical treatment for cases of intracranial cavernous hemangioma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討顱內海綿狀血管瘤顯微手術治療方法。

sentences.english: Following pregnancy and the discontinuation of contraceptives, the spider angiomas will disappear on their own.
sentences.chinese: 妊娠和避孕藥停藥後，蜘蛛狀血管瘤會自行消失。

sentences.english: What are the possible complications of hemangiomas?
sentences.chinese: 血管瘤可能發生的併發症有哪些？

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To explore the value of intravascular interventional treatment of maxillofacial racemose hemangioma.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究頜面部蔓狀血管瘤的血管內介入治療價值。

sentences.english: This hemangioma although grows slower, but the damage is bigger.
sentences.chinese: 這種血管瘤雖然增長較慢，但損害較大。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the ideal therapeutic method for eye socket entourages hemangiomas of infants.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討治療嬰兒眼瞼眶周血管瘤的方法。

sentences.english: Cholecystlithiasis, polyp of gallbladder , hemangioma of liver.
